SummaryEnglish: Apukunapa Kutimuyñin in Quechua means “El Regreso de los Apus” or “El Regreso de Los Dioses.” And in English it means The Return of the Gods. Apukunapa Kutimuyñin is specifically based on Andean mythology and it’s told through Japanese-styled animation. According to the teaser, Sisa is caught in a conflict between gods from South American history and humans that are struggling for control of the modern world.
